post:
We are happy to share this VPS offer with the LowEndTalk community:  

<em>&nbsp;<em>
[![OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only.](https://www.onvirt.io/assets/OnVirt_724x58.png)](https://www.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only.")  
<em>&nbsp;<em>

OnVirt is committed to its outstanding VPS performance. To guarantee high VPS performance we are only using quality hardware, KVM virtualziation and do **not** overcommit our systems. We offer a 14-days full money back guarantee to convince yourself.  

All OnVirt VPS are prepaid on a monthly basis and there are no setup fees. We accept PayPal and SEPA Bank Transfer.  

Our datacenter is equipped with first class carrier connectivity and direct uplinks to Deutsche Telekom (DTAG), GTT, DE-CiX and Hibernia (each 10 Gbit/s).
The high availability and Tier 3 (TIER III) certified datacenter is located in Frankfurt, Germany.

<em>&nbsp;<em>

> [**OnVirt • VPS Small**](https://www.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt • VPS Small")
> -
> * 1GB RAM
> * 1 CPU
> * 30GB SSD space (RAID10)
> * 2TB transfer
> * **Coupon: LET40** (This 40% discount coupon is also valid for our VPS Medium and VPS Large)
> * **6 EUR/month**

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Features**
-

Each VPS from OnVirt has the following features:

* 100Mbps uplink
* 1x IPv4
* 1x IPv6
* KVM
* Instant setup
* Operating System: Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora and CentOS (contact support for individual iso)

<em>&nbsp;<em>

**Technical**
-
Our VPS are running on the following **enterprise hardware**:

* Intel Xeon E5-1620v3 CPUs (A few hosts have Intel Xeon E3-1231v2)
* Enterprise-level SSDs (ZFS RAID10)
* ECC RAM
* SuperMicro Rackservers

Check out our **Looking Glass** at [http://lg.onvirt.io/](http://lg.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt Looking Glass"):  

* Test IPv4: 5.1.75.5  
* Test IPv6: 2a00:f820:50::13:5  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

We have been featured with almost the same offer on LowEndBox in June. Our VPS has now more SSD storage. You may check the comments on LEB,  too.  
[OnVirt – €6/month 1GB KVM in Frankfurt, Germany](http://lowendbox.com/blog/onvirt-e6-5month-1gb-kvm-25gb-ssd-in-frankfurt-germany/ "OnVirt – €6/month 1GB KVM in Frankfurt, Germany")  

<em>&nbsp;<em>

We are looking forward to your feedback, comments, speedtests, ... ;-)  

Best Regards  
Sebastian from [OnVirt](https://www.onvirt.io/ "OnVirt - Prepaid VPS. High Performance. SSD Only.")
